title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.16 - 20/08/2015
body:
On 20/08/15, starting at 04:00 AM Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.16. At 05:30 AM Sydney Time (19:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

Per the [previous announcement](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/t2vBl3Ec-upcoming-change-to-patch-day), Oceania will now be the first region to receive the patch, with other regions following a few hours later.

replies.body: would you know when the server is back online?
I thought we'd be having it on wednesday?
That was the initial plan (and still is for subsequent patches), although the release was pushed back by a day to ensure final fixes and testing were done.
ah ok, thanks for clearing things up
Is it in the morning or in the afternoon

Morning - I've clarified the O.P with AM :)

Cheers
Mindstar
